content: are making xl or xxl please knit one round more round 4 k44/51/59/66/74 pm k12/12/12/14/14 pm k44/51/59/66/74 round 5 k to 2 sts before sm yo k4 yo twice k to end of round round 6 k to end of round repeat rounds 5 and 6 another 67/67/69/69/71 times or more for longer poncho round 7 p to 2 sts before sm yo k4 yo twice p to end of round round 8 p to 2 sts before sm k4 twice p to end of round repeat rounds 7 and 8 another 9/9/11/11/12 times cast off knitwise loosely block using blocking pins/wires to smooth out bottom border ©copyright 2013 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy photograph or distribute this pattern
